title: Modern 1 bed in great location
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $3,000 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 08/02/2022
This state of the art building is right across the street from Berklee, a two minute walk from Newbury Street, and steps from MBTA bus and T stations.
Get the full downtown Boston experience at a discount!
One bedrooms are currently available with heat and hot water included.
Building amenities include complimentary laundry, two public rooftop spaces, and optional additional surface and garage parking.
Two elevators service the petite 30 unit, 6 floor structure and the garage has storage for your bicycle as well as your car if available for additional rent.
Unit amenities include a dishwasher, Nest thermostats, microwave and range, and modern bathrooms.
Hardwood floors in every unit give way to tiling in the kitchen and bathrooms, and bay windows flood the living rooms and bedrooms with light during the day.
